00019 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/serialization/strong_typedef.hpp>
00021 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00022 
00023 #include <boost/archive/detail/auto_link_archive.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_prefix.hpp> // must be the last header
00025 
00026 namespace boost {
00027 namespace archive {
00028 
00029 BOOST_STRONG_TYPEDEF(unsigned int, version_type)
00030 BOOST_STRONG_TYPEDEF(int, class_id_type)
00031 BOOST_STRONG_TYPEDEF(int, class_id_optional_type)
00032 BOOST_STRONG_TYPEDEF(int, class_id_reference_type)
00033 BOOST_STRONG_TYPEDEF(unsigned int, object_id_type)
00034 BOOST_STRONG_TYPEDEF(unsigned int, object_reference_type)
00037 struct tracking_type {
00038     typedef bool value_type;
00039     bool t;
00040     explicit tracking_type(const bool t_ = false)
00041         : t(t_)
00042     {};
00043     tracking_type(const tracking_type & t_)
00044         : t(t_.t)
00045     {}
00046     operator bool () const {
00047         return t;
00048     };
00049     operator bool & () {
00050         return t;
00051     };
00052     tracking_type & operator=(const bool t_){
00053         t = t_;
00054         return *this;
00055     }
00056     bool operator==(const tracking_type & rhs) const {
00057         return t == rhs.t;
00058     }
00059     bool operator==(const bool & rhs) const {
00060         return t == rhs;
00061     }
00062     tracking_type & operator=(const tracking_type & rhs){
00063         t = rhs.t;
00064         return *this;
00065     }
00066 };
00069 struct class_name_type : private boost::noncopyable {
00070     char *t;
00071     operator const char * & () const {
00072         return const_cast<const char * &>(t);
00073     }
00074     operator char * () {
00075         return t;
00076     }
00077     explicit class_name_type(const char *key_) 
00078     : t(const_cast<char *>(key_)){}
00079     explicit class_name_type(char *key_) 
00080     : t(key_){}
00081     class_name_type & operator=(const class_name_type & rhs){
00082         t = rhs.t;
00083         return *this;
00084     }
00085 };
00086 
00087 enum archive_flags {
00088     no_header = 1,  // suppress archive header info
00089     no_codecvt = 2,  // suppress alteration of codecvt facet
00090     no_xml_tag_checking = 4,   // suppress checking of xml tags
00091     no_tracking = 8,           // suppress ALL tracking
00092     flags_last = 8
00093 };
00094 
00095 #define NULL_POINTER_TAG class_id_type(-1)
00096 
00097 BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(const char *)
00098 BOOST_ARCHIVE_SIGNATURE();
00099 
00100 BOOST_ARCHIVE_DECL(unsigned char)
00101 BOOST_ARCHIVE_VERSION();
00102 
00103 }// namespace archive
00104 }// namespace boost
00105 
00106 #include <boost/archive/detail/abi_suffix.hpp> // pops abi_suffix.hpp pragmas
00107 
00108 #include <boost/serialization/level.hpp>
00109 
00110 // set implementation level to primitive for all types
00111 // used internally by the serialization library
00112 
00113 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(boost::archive::version_type, primitive_type)
00114 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(boost::archive::class_id_type, primitive_type)
00115 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(boost::archive::class_id_reference_type, primitive_type)
00116 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(boost::archive::class_id_optional_type, primitive_type)
00117 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(boost::archive::class_name_type, primitive_type)
00118 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(boost::archive::object_id_type, primitive_type)
00119 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(boost::archive::object_reference_type, primitive_type)
00120 BOOST_CLASS_IMPLEMENTATION(boost::archive::tracking_type, primitive_type)
00121 
00122 #endif //BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_ARCHIVE_HPP
